text:
Goodbye and Reunion

Raskolnikov and Razumihin at the door, tense.  
Raskolnikov: “I want to shake hands here.”  
Razumihin: “What’s the matter with you, Rodya?”  

---

Inside, Raskolnikov opens the door, shocked.  
Raskolnikov: “Why didn’t I expect them?”  
Mother: “Good Heavens, what had become of him?”  

---

Joyful cries fill the room, but he stands frozen.  
Sister: “Rodya!”  
Raskolnikov: “I can’t embrace them…”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov is taken aback by the unexpected arrival of his mother and sister, who are filled with concern for his well-being.
